function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deployment of UC-19 in occupational mental health and PFA.","Impact":"Potential public health implications if basic psychological skills are not effectively managed.","Mitigation":"Ensure relevant stakeholders are equipped with essential basic psychological skills for managing the impact of COVID-19.","Technologies":"UC-19, telepsychiatry","People":"Stakeholders, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Online delivery of UC-19 and telepsychiatry.","Impact":"Ethical considerations regarding confidentiality and risk management.","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines for confidentiality and risk management in online delivery of mental health services.","Technologies":"Telepsychiatry, digital health platforms","People":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Adoption of UC-19 module contents by non-profit organization for mental health information dissemination.","Impact":"Ensuring accuracy and suitability of the module contents for public consumption.","Mitigation":"Provide oversight and review of the module contents by mental health professionals to ensure accuracy and suitability for public consumption.","Technologies":"Digital health platforms, social media","People":"Non-profit organization, mental health professionals, public","Owner":"Non-profit organization, mental health professionals"}]}
